events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all.
The case has been categorized under 'Refund' based on the customer's request for money back due to sizing issues.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with the refund process for your recent purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can process your request promptly?
My order number is 123456. The jacket is too small and doesn't match the size chart provided on your website.
We can offer you a full refund once the jacket is returned to us. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Thank you for your quick response. I appreciate the return label and will send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
As no further issues were reported, this refund case is now closed. Please reach out again if you need further assistance.
